Articles.Content:
I used to have a very un-aerodynamic, single piece 6 port Spaceport with fuel storage underneath, but since then i got FAR and Deadly Reentry and i wanted to make it more realistic, so i also got Infernal Robotics and made a new Russian inspired rocket to launch to orbit my new Spaceport! It was all flown manually, no autopilot. Reccomend watching it in HD.

Mods used:

6S Service Compartment Tubes (Compartments to put RCS Tanks, Batteries, storage, etc)

Deadly Reentry (Simulates dynamic heating)

Enhanced Navball (Adds extra reference nodes to the navball)

Ferram Aerospace Research (Realistic Aerodynamics)

High Contrast Navball (Better looking, easier to read Navball)

Infernal Robotics (Motorized Hinges)

Kerbal Attachment System (Utility containers)

Kerbal Engineer Redux (Does the math for you, useful craft information)

KW Rocketry (3.75 M parts, side tanks, engines)

Procedural Fairings (Fairings that fit anything)

Steam Gauges (Lots of useful information)

I would really appreciate any constructive criticism or other feedback
